questions: A rectangular field has a length of 25 meters and a width of 18 meters. What is the perimeter of the field?
The area of a square garden is 121 square meters. What is the length of one side of the square?
The base of a parallelogram is 15 centimeters, and its height is 12 centimeters. What is the area of the parallelogram?
A triangle has sides of length 9 cm, 12 cm, and 15 cm. What is the area of the triangle?
If the circumference of a circle is 31.4 centimeters, what is its radius? (Take π as 3.14)
The diameter of a circle is 16 meters. What is the area of the circle?
The circumference of a circular race track is 220 meters. What is its radius?
The area of a circular garden is 154 square meters. What is its circumference?
The diameter of a circular water tank is 12 meters. What is the volume of the tank? (Assume π as 3.14 and the tank's height is 8 meters.)
A circular pizza has a diameter of 20 inches. What is the area of the pizza? (Take π as 3.14)
